thread.title: Handy Hotel
thread.title_full: Handy Hotel - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: w_john_c
title: Handy Hotel
text:
We planned a night in Londin to see Les Mis√®rables and needed a handy location for a hotel close to Euston Railway station and this fitted the bill.
If it's 2 minutes from the station, that's all it is and if you sneak out via the cycle parking, it's even quicker!
Cheak in had been done online and when we arrived at the hotel at 11.45 they already had everything on file and we dropped our bags and went for a wonder until the rooms were available at 14.00.
Quick pick of the keys and we found the rooms comfortable and quite.
Check out was equally as quick, just drop the keys and we were back in the station in 2 mins.
Will we use the hotel again? Certainly
Will we go again, certainly
